select id, role, user_type, username, user_no, password_hash, password_pay_hash, password_reset_token, auth_key, status, mobile, email, realname, id_card, sex, litpic, birthday, email_binding_status, mobile_binding_status, real_verify_status, card_binding_status, sina_open_status, card_id_base, created_at, last_logintime, updated_at, created_ip, invite_userid, real_verify_time, jsession_id, luckydraw_login, luckydraw_tender, loginTimes from tb_user
